item.title: My Journey into Natural Language Processing
item.description: A reflection on how I got started with NLP, the challenges I faced, and the lessons I learned along the way.

item.title: About
item.description: Hi! Link to heading Currently, I am a master’s student in software engineering at the IUST. My bachelor’s degree in statistics is from Alzahra University. Natural Language Processing is my main research interest. Specifically, I study NLP models’ robustness. I love data, and I have experience working in the data science field. Developing machine learning models from the beginning to end is something I enjoy doing.
